title: 恶魔果实0.3.1的船不刷还有没有电话虫怎么回事
author: 牛逼个蛋蛋

replies.author: 凯琳
replies.txt_content: 打开客户端config里面有调的，你要是不懂就把里面的呢个文字发给我，我给你看看

replies.author: 牛逼个蛋蛋
replies.txt_content:
凯琳 发表于 2018-6-26 18:33
打开客户端config里面有调的，你要是不懂就把里面的呢个文字发给我，我给你看看 ...
# Configuration file

general {
    B:"Allow Devil Fruits to drop from leaves"=false
    B:"Allow Logia Invulnerability"=true
    B:"Allow Ships to Spawn"=true
    S:"Keep stats after death"=auto
    I:"Modifier for Spawning Ships"=1
    I:"Rate at which Devil Fruits drop from leaves"=1
    B:"Receive Extra Hearts"=true
}


system {
    B:"Allow FOV Modifiers"=false
    B:"Allow Telemetry"=true
    B:"Allow Update Message"=true
}
是这个么
